modShortDescription: This mod adds a lot of guns and gun mods to the game. There have many other things in this mod. And the best, a huge display of fireworks.
modDescription:
_IvanDX is from China, and not good as English._

This mod adds a lot of [guns](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) and gun mods to the game.

About this mod please [see the video](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV12X4y1M7r6).

Right now, you can use EOTechG33 + AimpointM3 + PVS22 three scopes on one weapon. Or, ACOG\_ECOS + PVS22, Or just G33 + PVS22, without Reticle.

All those scopes use “C” or “Ctrl”key to change state.

There have many other things in this mod.

And the best, a huge display of fireworks.

## Noted

* **LavenderManor:** When you planted Lavenders, they have a chance to grow up to LavenderManor, it was more beautiful.
* **TαVirus:** When you get hit by zombies, you may infect TαVirus. at first, you feel nothing, then in a while, the symptom will show up.
* And dont ask again, this virus has no cure. That’s why the whole world end.

**[Download](https://mega.nz/file/LagVnSwa#ojx75eHG5rMARXzsyNGDSzEJZmJ0ybWjOCjthIE8Rco)** for A19  
**[Download](https://mega.nz/folder/bGojAaLZ#yS8BEO1kliJ167zJGPdwZw)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22933-a19-tacticalaction/).

**Credits:** IvanDX
